title: Arch Linux Installer Now Supports Hyprland WM, Limine Bootloader
description:
Archinstall 2.6 official Arch Linux text-mode installer is out now with support for Hyprland WM, Limine bootloader, revamped partitioning, new languages, and more.

The post Arch Linux Installer Now Supports Hyprland WM, Limine Bootloader appeared first on 9to5Linux - do not reproduce this article without permission. This RSS feed is intended for readers, not scrapers.
